name: Sonic The Hedgehog 360
description:
Enjoy the first Level of the Original Sonic The Hedgehog in 8-Bit on PC!

A blue hedgehog with supersonic speed must rescue animals from being turned into robots by a mad scientist. Doctor Robotnik is an evil and mad scientist who only had one destiny, taking over the whole world and to do this he needs to collect all six chaos emeralds which are located on the South Island.

Plus 

Get the Encore Edition with a new zone!
